name: The Water Odyssey
description:
The Water Odyssey is a game that combines roguelike and bullet hell mechanics, the main objective is to explore a vast forest area where the player must face several enemies, as the player progresses he can improve his skills and even get passive skills that will help him in the fight.

MEMBERS:

Jordi Barcia

Adrian Puig

Pol Coller

Jose Antonio Moreno
